subject: RE: [junit] jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.
msgSnippet: The TestRunner configuration can be either set on the command line with the -noloading switch or in the junit.properties file located in the user.home by
messageBody:
"The TestRunner configuration can be either set on the command line with
the -noloading switch or in the junit.properties file located in the
"user.home" by adding an entry loading=false.

Thanks for this information. I am running on Windows NT (don't look at me,
it's their idea) and I can't find any junit.properties file on the system.
Do you have any information about this?

Thanks in advance,
Bret
